programKpis.name: Employee-Reported Stability Improvement
programKpis.description: Average change in employee-reported stability across housing, transportation, and financial areas over time.

programKpis.name: Resource Access Conversion Rate
programKpis.description: Percent of employees who successfully access at least one resource after referral or direct engagement.

programKpis.name: Support Area Utilization Rate
programKpis.description: Utilization by support category and overall utilization rate.

programKpis.name: Participants per Support Area
programKpis.description: Raw participant count by support category (housing, transportation, financial, etc.).

programKpis.name: Partners Meeting Service Standards
programKpis.description: Percent of active partners meeting agreement terms and service delivery standards.

programKpis.name: Program Awareness Rate
programKpis.description: Percent of surveyed employees who indicate awareness of the program in periodic internal surveys.

coordinatorKpis.name: Referral Response Rate
coordinatorKpis.description: Percent of assigned referrals with first coordinator response within SLA.

coordinatorKpis.name: Employee Engagement Count
coordinatorKpis.description: Count of coordinator-led employee engagements (meetings/calls/messages) in period.

coordinatorKpis.name: Resource Presentation Count
coordinatorKpis.description: Count of resource presentations delivered or coordinated by the coordinator.

coordinatorKpis.name: Time Allocation to Direct Service
coordinatorKpis.description: Share of coordinator effort spent on direct employee support versus administrative activities.

coordinatorKpis.name: Coordinator Satisfaction / Feedback Score
coordinatorKpis.description: Average employee satisfaction score for coordinator interactions.

coordinatorKpis.name: Documentation Completion & Submission Rate
coordinatorKpis.description: Percent of required progress notes submitted and finalized on time.
